content.title: Record the Second Test Case
content.body:
1. In the Test Case Recorder window, write the test case name: Logout.
  2. Click the refresh icon in the Iris Preview window.
  3. From the Test Case Recorder window, select Record.
  4. Navigate to the Live Preview in the Accounts screen.
  5. From the header, select the Logout button.
    On a successful logout, you will be navigated to the Login Screen.
